scripts.copy-electron-app: cd ../ && cd electron-app && npm run copy && cd ../ && cd electron-app-test && node ../copy.js src=../electron-app dest=./app
scripts.copy-renderer: node ../copy.js src=./src/renderer/src dest=./app/src/renderer/src && node ../copy.js src=./src/renderer/renderer dest=./app/src/renderer
scripts.copy: node ../delete.js src=./app && npm run copy-electron-app && npm run copy-env && npm run copy-renderer && npm run copy-main && npm run copy-preload && npm run copy-test
scripts.copy-no-app: npm run copy-test-files && npm run copy-env && npm run copy-renderer && npm run copy-main && npm run copy-preload
scripts.test: npm run copy && npm-run-all --parallel start-db-server run-tests
scripts.run-tests: node -e "setTimeout(() => process.exit(0), 2000)" && cd app && npm run test
scripts.test-no-copy-app: npm run copy-no-app && cd app && npm run test
